  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:bioo_es_20070518_2_0030211</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0030211</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Procesos geológicos</string>
            <string language="en">Geological processes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geologische Prozesse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Processus géologiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Processos geological</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Processi geologici</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γεωλογικές διαδικασίες</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Se establece una distinción entre procesos geológicos que actúan de forma pasiva y de forma activa sobre las rocas. Además, se explica el concepto de meteorización, erosión, transporte y sedimentación.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic establishing a distinction between the geological processes which act passively and actively on rocks. The concepts of weathering, erosion, transport and sedimentation are also explained.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geología</string>
            <string language="en">geology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">procesos</string>
            <string language="en">processes</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thema, das eine Unterscheidung zwischen den 
geologischen Prozessen herstellt, die passiv und aktiv auf Felsen 
fungieren. Die Konzepte von Weathering, von Abnutzung, von 
Transport und von Sedimentbildung werden auch erklärt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sujet établissant une distinction entre les 
processus géologiques qui agissent passivement et activement sur des 
roches. Les concepts de survivre à, d'érosion, de 
transport et de sédimentation sont également expliqués.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tópico que estabelece uma distinção entre os 
processos geological que agem passiva e ativamente em rochas. Os
conceitos do weathering, da erosão, do transporte e do sedimentation 
são explicados também.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soggetto che stabilisce una distinzione fra i 
processi geologici che si comportano passivamente ed attivamente sulle
roccie. I concetti di weathering, di erosione, di trasporto e 
della sedimentazione egualmente sono spiegati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που καθιερώνει μια διάκριση μεταξύ των 
γεωλογικών διαδικασιών που ενεργούν παθητικά και ενεργά στους 
βράχους. Οι έννοιες της διάβρωσης, της διάβρωσης, της 
μεταφοράς και της ιζηματογένεσης εξηγούνται επίσης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Prozesse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">géologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">processus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">geologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">processos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">processi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γεωλογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βιόσφαιρα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διαδικασίες</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
